snippet.title: Cover Yourself in Blood Update [NEW Gameplay Trailer]
snippet.description:
Lots of new stuff!

-Added a high score

-Changed the font of every text, the look of the buttons and added a splash screen

-Added a setting menu

-Added a landing sound effect (can be disabled)

-Really improved the visuals (psx shader, better textures, better fog and added clouds)
